ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Harmonic I didn t say it was too powerful.  I said that VERANT will think it s too powerful. Please don t put words in my mouth. Also, you re ignoring the fact
ygData.messageBody:
Harmonic I didn't say it was too powerful. I said that VERANT will think
it's too powerful.

Please don't put words in my mouth.

Also, you're ignoring the fact that you're adding another healing song that
combines the effect of 3 other songs then is stackable with them. I dont
think they will do it. If they did... GREAT. But I seriously doubt it will
happen.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Ryan Honeyman" <honeyman@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 12:30 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs


> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > Uhh
> > Nivs = 15hp / tic. Hymn = 17hp/tic this=35hp/tic
> > Total= roughly 70hp/tic
> > I seriously doubt Verant will go for something like this that, on top of
all
> > that, throws on Clarity, a spell shield, and whatever else nivs does.
>
> 70 hp / tick when mobs can hit in the multiple hundreds?
>
> I can heal for roughly mid 30s in lguk and things hit for 100.
> That's a third of the damage being done just in healing.
>
> I would hope I could stick to that ratio, and heal 100 per tick
> when mobs can do 300-400 dmg per swing.
>
> You are not thinking ahead, you are stuck in this shell of a
> broken game in the current state. Thing are going to change.
> Our songs have to be excellent at L60 versus L63 NPCs. No one
> is thinking down that path yet. And it's even hard for me to.
>
> +75 STR, and you're like OMG, that's too much.
>
> -or-
>
> +100 AC, *nothing* gives that much you think... well at L60
> maybe it should.
>
> Maybe we should heal 150 per tick with a +50 AC shield, I mean
> when was the last L53+ mob you encountered without bringing
> 24+ people. We're gonna have to fight L53+ mobs in groups of
> six people, just like you fight L45 mobs in groups of six.
>
> Harmonic.
>
>
